alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 9:14PM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 to 12 inches with localized amounts up to 2 feet along the ridgetops. Winds gusting to 40 mph resulting in areas of drifting and blowing snow. * WHERE...Mountain Road, Peola, Anatone, and Cloverland Road. * WHEN...From 1 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions Wednesday and Thursday as well as localized blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
